name: Spectrum Technologies
overview:
Spectrum is a technology and business consulting firm offering services in the area of Sales Performance Management (SPM).

Spectrum’s SPM team consists of technology and business professionals, each with multiple years of expertise in analyzing, implementing and supporting on-premise and cloud based SPM solutions. We have formal technical and consulting partnerships with the 4 top tier SPM vendors: Callidus, Varicent, Xactly and Merced (now NICE).

Armed with a team of 40+ professionals spread over US and India, we provide a full range of SPM services to our customers. Our services include:

  • SPM Solution Evaluation and Selection
  • Strategic Consultation
  • Solution / System Implementation
  • Project Management
  • Managed Services
  • Support & Maintenance Services
  • Fiscal Year Comp Plan Setup and Support

Founded in 2005, Spectrum has consistent record of growth and profitability by making our customers’ success our top priority.
